content.html: Well, it’s come to this. Twitter is burning, a billionaire owes money, so an API will soon get lobotomized. Assuming that actually happens, this feed will die by April 29. Sorry for the bad news. So long, and thanks for all the fish!

name: twitter-atom will shut down within a month
